trans-unit.source: Provides pixel format conversion functionality for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade de conversão de formato de pixel para um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: FormatConvertedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: FormatConvertedBitmap implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can occur only during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: Alterações de propriedade podem ocorrer somente durante a inicialização do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>para sinalizar que a inicialização começou e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>para sinalizar que a inicialização foi concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: FormatConvertedBitmap objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: FormatConvertedBitmap os objetos criados com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29>construtor são inicializados automaticamente e as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29>

trans-unit.source: For format conversions between RGB color spaces with different characteristics, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> class should be used.
trans-unit.target: Para conversões de formato entre espaços de cor RGB com características diferentes, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>classe deve ser usada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Conversions between color spaces need a source color profile and destination color profile for gamut mapping to provide a reliable color conversion.
trans-unit.target: Conversões entre espaços de cores precisam de um perfil de cor de fonte e o perfil de cor de destino para mapeamento de gama para fornecer uma conversão de cor confiável.

trans-unit.source: The color profiles are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A> or by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Os perfis de cor são fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>parâmetros do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A>ou o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: Marcas de metadados relacionadas aos dados da imagem devem ser atualizadas se uma imagem é salvo em um arquivo depois de uma transformação é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>criado usando este construtor, você deve executar a inicialização de propriedade entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>chamadas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> class that has the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> classe que foi especificado <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>os objetos criados com esse construtor são inicializados automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance if `destinationFormat` is an indexed format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> instância se `destinationFormat` é um formato indexado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alpha channel threshold of a bitmap when converting to palletized formats that recognizes an alpha color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite de canal alfa um bitmap ao converter formatos da paleta que reconhece uma cor alfa.

trans-unit.source: The AlphaThreshold value is used to determine what level of opacity will be mapped to the fully transparent color in the converted format.
trans-unit.target: O valor de AlphaThreshold é usado para determinar o nível de opacidade será mapeado para a cor transparente totalmente convertido no novo formato.

trans-unit.source: A value of 9.8 implies that any pixel with an alpha value of less than 25 will be mapped to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 9,8 indica que qualquer pixel com um valor alfa de menos de 25 será mapeado para a cor transparente.

trans-unit.source: A value of 100 maps all pixels which are not fully opaque to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 100 mapeia todos os pixels que não são totalmente opacos para a cor transparente.

trans-unit.source: The destination palette should provide a transparent color; otherwise, the transparent color will be the one closest to zero, often black.
trans-unit.target: A paleta de destino deve fornecer uma cor transparente. Caso contrário, a cor transparente será o mais próximo a zero, geralmente preto.

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel threshold for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O limite de canal alfa para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.0.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (mas eles não podem resolver) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> era de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pixel format to convert the bitmap to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o formato de pixel para converter o bitmap.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The pixel format to apply to the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O formato de pixel para aplicar o bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the palette to apply to the bitmap if the format is indexed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a paleta para aplicar a bitmap se o formato é indexado.

trans-unit.source: You must set this property if you want to use an indexed pixel format for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir essa propriedade se você quiser usar um formato de pixel indexado para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The destination palette to apply to the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A paleta de destino para aplicar o bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Sinaliza o término do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref> inicialização.

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit calls, as demonstrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Inicialização de propriedade deve ser feita entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>e chamadas de EndInit, conforme demonstrado no exemplo a seguir.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>tiver sido inicializado, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> property is an indexed format and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The palette colors do not match the destination format. -or- The EndInit method is called without first calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit*>.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. - ou - <> </> *> propriedade é um formato indexado e <> </> *> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>. - ou - as cores de paleta não corresponde ao formato de destino. - ou - EndInit o método for chamado sem chamar primeiro <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the Source property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that you want.
trans-unit.target: É possível encadear uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>para outro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>, definindo a propriedade de origem do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>que você deseja.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example of chaining.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: cadeia BitmapSource objetos juntos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter um exemplo de encadeamento.
